overview: Basel Kilany is the Investment Director of the Joint Startups Program, based in California, USA. Kilany, a Harvard Business School graduate, is a serial entrepreneur with over 14 years of experience in diverse executive and consulting positions for global firms such as T-Mobile, GE, and Acuity Brands. He is also a a Co-founder of the Queen Rania Center for Entrepreneurship in Jordan. He holds an MBA and also a BSc in Industrial & Systems Engineering from the Ohio State University.
